amendment.description: Amendment sought to clarify that nothing in the bill shall be construed as prohibiting investment by an employee benefit plan in domestic investments, as distinguished from foreign investments, and require the Secretary of Labor to take actions to encourage domestic investments by pension plans.
amendment.purpose: An amendment stating to clarify that nothing in the bill shall be construed as prohibiting investment by an employee benefit plan in domestic investments, as distinguished from foreign investments, and requires the Secretary of Labor to take actions to encourage domestic investments by pension plans.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Hinchey amendment (A006) Failed by recorded vote: 179 - 234 (Roll no. 650).
